.. _overview-page:

==========
 Overview
==========

What is SemiPy ?
----------------

SemiPy is an open-source python framework for analyzing, modeling, and plotting IV data of semiconductor devices.
The project is managed by the `PopLab at Stanford University <http://poplab.stanford.edu/>`_.

How is SemiPy licensed ?
------------------------
